resources.string: SaveGhana with support from Star-Ghana hopes to enhance community participation in the actvities of MMDAs. You are loging in to contribute towards that. You report revenues and also being offered with the chance to keep track of all revenue reports. Your reports of revenue will help in keeping track of district assembly revenue mobilisation and expenditure.view_user_profile_button_description
Click to make a new revenue entry
Click to view and edit your profile
Click to add a tax payer to the district database
